attributes.action: ALLOW THE UK TO BE THE DEMOCRACY,AND LET THE PUBLIC VOTE ON EUROPE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: YOU CANNOT GIVE ANY POWER TO EUROPE WITHOUT FIRST ASKING THE PUBLIC TO VOTE.DECISIONS THAT BIG CANNOT BE BROUGHT IN THE BACK DOOR..!!!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
